meanings.definition: The quality of being lively or energetic.
meanings.sent1: Her zippiness on the playground always made the other kids smile.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's zippiness was evident as it ran around the yard chasing its tail.
meanings.sent3: The zippiness of the squirrel gathering nuts was quite entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: His zippiness in completing the race was like a bolt of lightning.
meanings.sent5: The zippiness of the music made everyone want to get up and dance.

meanings.definition: A characteristic of being quick or speedy.
meanings.sent1: The car's zippiness allowed it to zoom past the other vehicles on the highway.
meanings.sent2: The cheetah's zippiness helped it catch its prey in seconds.
meanings.sent3: The zippiness of the roller coaster ride left everyone breathless and exhilarated.
meanings.sent4: Her zippiness in solving puzzles amazed everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The zippiness of the internet connection made browsing the web a breeze.
